post_text: As we celebrated our first graduating class of 8th graders tonight, we looked back on the last 7 years and all the changes we have undergone as a community. The building looked beautiful tonight, standing tall and proud, reminding us of how far we’ve come. We wish we could be inside celebrating together. We are so proud of our students and honored to be part of their journey. The 8th grade graduates we’ve envisioned for years are ready to head out into the world and change it for the better. We love you, we believe in you, and you will always have a home here at LPA. Congratulations class of 2020!

LPA's 1st Enrollment Deadline is in just 9 weeks! (March 12th). Tune in each week for great reasons to enroll your child at Lafayette Preparatory Academy.

Fact #1-
LPA has students in Kindergarten through 8th grade.

Once your child is enrolled in LPA, they have a school to attend through elementary AND middle school! No more applications, no more stress over "where is my child going to go".

New in the 2020-2021 school year, all students K-8 will attend school at the same time. (8:15-3:30) 1 drop off, 1 pick up for all of your kids!

Visit http://lafayetteprep.org/enrollment-2/enrollment-process-at-lpa/ for more information on how to join the LPA Family!
